description: The tofu takes on the smoky flavours of the marinade that makes this Japanese inspired skewer so delicious.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Tofu,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Tofu Yakitori Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan on a medium heat, fry all of the sauce/marinade ingredients for 20 minutes until the sauce reduces by half.
Once the sauce has thickened, remove from the heat and separate into 2 bowls. 1 is for marinating the skewers and the other is for serving as a dip.
Now on skewers, alternate the tofu and onion chunks. Heat up a chargrill to a medium heat. Drizzle the Tofu with canola oil before grilling.
Fry the Tofu skewers on the chargrill for 5 minutes while rotating. Baste the Tofu with the marinade while cooking and rotate.
Repeat the basting process about 3 to 4 times until the Tofu is cooked fully though. Serve the skewers with the extra dipping sauce on the side and a choice of condiments.
